synopsis.text: Leo-human hybrids, honey badger-human hybrids, and unsuspecting college students collide in a world of underground death matches known as Killing Bites. Yuuya Nomoto, a typical college student, finds himself in the driver's seat of a twisted scheme to kidnap high school girls. But when their latest target, Hitomi Uzaki, turns the tables and brutally dispatches her would-be captors, Yuuya is plunged into a dark underworld of genetically engineered fighters. As a Therianthrope, a human fused with animal DNA, Hitomi is a force to be reckoned with, possessing the fearlessness and strength of a honey badger. Now, with his life inextricably linked to Hitomi's success in the Killing Bites, Yuuya must navigate this savage world of high-stakes battles, where the ultimate prize is control over the economy. Brace yourself for a thrilling ride as Yuuya and Hitomi take on the deadliest beasts in the arena!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
